User-agent: *
Allow: /

# Sitemaps
Sitemap: https://pvchaiti.com/sitemap.xml

# Crawl delay
Crawl-delay: 1

# Specific rules for common bots
User-agent: Googlebot
Allow: /

User-agent: Bingbot
Allow: /

# Block AI training bots if desired
User-agent: GPTBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: ChatGPT-User
Disallow: /

User-agent: CCBot
Disallow: /

User-agent: anthropic-ai
Disallow: /

User-agent: Claude-Web
Disallow: /
